attributes.action: Let Geert Wilders into Our Country!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Geert Wilders is a prominant Dutch Politician. He is being barred from entry into the UK because he dares to speak up against Radical Islamists. Our Government allows Radical Islamists into Our Country even gives them free housing but refuse this legitimate politician entry. We need to listen to views like Mr Wilders's.Please give your support to free speech!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
